translation1: "Today, let's take a look at some [strange search trends]. What is a normal search trend? I will randomly select three hot search terms: the Lunar New Year on February 2nd, the increase in the price of good friends, and the commodity price-raising incident. The search trend spreads and forms a wave, and then [the trend decreases exponentially] (smooth curve), eventually dissipating. If a secondary search trend occurs, a small wave will reappear.They look exactly the same as the【Network Sentiment Evolution Model】displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration of China. What is abnormal sentiment? Randomly select six hot searches from the same event and present【isolated peak】、【jagged】、【cliff】.The following text is a description of three different types of events in Chinese social media:  【孤峰状】This refers to an event that quickly rises to the top of the hot search list due to public interest, such as a sudden increase in temperature.  【锯齿状】This refers to an event that periodically rises to the top of the hot search list, ensuring that the topic remains popular.  【断崖状】This refers to a collective withdrawal from the topic, indicating that the hot search has fulfilled its \"function,\" and the topic has moved on to a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of one event's heat wave coincides with the trough of another event's heat wave, with time differences of only seconds, indicating that it is likely that the unified water army was given a new mission and launched a new offensive. The professionalization of black public opinion can be seen in the dozens of hot searches simultaneously appearing on the list, with some attracting attention, some responsible for knowledge dissemination, some creating strategic opportunities, some diverting attention, some influencing cognition, somePropaganda is a science, discarding subjective factors such as stance and emotions, and only relying on objective data. Even black public relations will have no place to hide. Everyone who passes by will leave a trace, and we will excavate these traces together. Data source: Time machine."

Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again. translation1: "Is taking a bath in a bathtub with foam on your feet a sign of a leak? Choosing an appropriate bathtub can have good therapeutic effects on your feet, and today's Country Style editor will answer this question for you, hoping to be helpful to friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, bathtubs have become more and more popular among consumers, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged on the market, ranging from hundreds of yuan to thousands of yuan, providing consumers with a wide range of choices.On the relevant data, compared to traditional home appliances, health-related home appliances such as bathtubs are selling hot, but there is no special industry standard for bathtubs, so there are certain safety risks. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water!\" Mr. Li told the reporter. Recently, he bought a bathtub as a gift for his father's birthday, but when his father soaked his feet in it, he felt a tingling sensation in his feet.At first, Mr. Li thought it was the vibration function of the bathtub that caused the sensation, but after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in his feet. Mr. Li tried writing with a pen, and to his surprise, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the bathtub was electrified. Later, he contacted the store, and the store's attitude was not bad. Although they refunded the bathtub, Mr. Li still felt uncomfortable.Because he found that there is no clear and detailed industry regulation for the popular bathtub, such as whether it is suitable for what kind of people, what kind of materials are used, and whether it is safe at the highest setting. However, in general, bathtubs do not have electricity problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may not be strictly controlled during manufacturing. Therefore, when purchasing a bathtub, it is recommended to choose a disassembled type.Water and electricity separation has no safety hazards. At the same time, you can freely use the pen to test."

translation1: "Education News: The proportion of gifted students in Beijing's 2016 middle school entrance examination was reduced. According to a report by the Xinhua News Agency on January 21st and 22nd, the work of organizing the middle school entrance examination for gifted students in Beijing was unified by each district education committee. The admission rate does not exceed 10% of the school's planned enrollment. Students with sports, art, and science and technology specialties who have registered online are eligible to participate in the special talent enrollment examination. To facilitate students' participation in the examination, the Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement adopted last year, and sets up 1-2 examination sites in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites.The examination points are divided into examination zones, and the examination time is divided into time periods. On the day of the examination, students will enter the examination points in different examination zones and take the examination according to the time periods. On May 23rd, the list of students who passed the examination will be announced on the website of the district education admission examination center, and students can query the examination results online."

Lemon can bring a refreshing citrus aroma to the whisky, of course, the sweet-sour balance can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences. translation1: "The first contemporary art biennial in Saudi Arabia, the Diriyah Biennial of Contemporary Art, was officially opened to the public on December 11 in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia. The biennial is co-organized by the Diriyah Biennial of Contemporary Art Foundation and the UCCA Dune Art Museum in China. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China, and other countries are participating in the exhibition. The artistic director of the exhibition is Zhang Ga, the director of the UCCA Dune Art Museum.According to the introduction by the curatorial team, the theme of this year's double exhibition is \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River\", which represents the reform strategies taken during the period of social economic transformation and also reflects the current situation of Saudi cultural development. This year's double exhibition covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with six interconnected buildings presenting six units: \"Touching the Stones to Cross the River\", \"Inheritance as an Experiment\", \"Edge Thinking\", \"Towards the Public\", \"Beautiful New World\", and \"On the Spirit of Art\". Among the 27 Saudi artists' works, more than 40% are included, covering painting, installation art, and performance art, among others; 12 Chinese artists' works are also highly anticipated, some of whom use innovative ways to create art using recycled materials, such as Xu Bing's \"Behind the Story Series: The Endless Mountain in the Creek\" (2014), which reconstructs a classic landscape painting using discarded materials.According to Bakkili, the chief executive officer of the Diraiye Foundation, he hopes that this year's biennial exhibition can establish an international dialogue and allow global audiences to understand the cultural and creative industries and creative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen exchanges and interactions. Tian Pengyu said: \"The objective of the biennial exhibition is double-edged, enabling Saudi contemporary art to participate in global dialogue and allowing Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art.\" It is reported that during the period of the opening of the biennial exhibition, a series of lectures will be held, and artists, curators, and leaders of the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural communication and the development of contemporary art."

translation1: "In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory building located in Yiwu Town, Zhejiang Province, from his house. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Lu decided to buy the factory building. In December 2020, Mr. Lu negotiated the details of the purchase with the owner's family member Lin and paid a deposit of 200,000 yuan by transferring the money through a bank. Lin signed the \"Factory Building Purchase and Sale Agreement\" as the recipient of the deposit, stating that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory building, the deposit would be returned to the seller, and if the seller did not want to sell the factory building, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the buyer. Both parties agreed to sign the factory building purchase and sale agreement within a week.However, after the two parties failed to reach a consensus on issues such as the scope of the factory and the payment method in the sales contract, the house purchase contract was delayed and could not be signed. Considering that the two parties could not reach a consensus on the contract terms, a few days later, Mr. Lin decided to refund the 20,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu. After finally finding a house that he liked, paid the deposit, and was ready to pay the balance, he was just one step away from signing the contract, but the seller refused to sell, which made Mr. Lu feel helpless and angry.Therefore, Mr. Lu will file a lawsuit against Mr. Lin in Yueyang City People's Court. The court after reviewing the case found that the two parties were unable to sign a formal contract and cannot solely blame the defendant. It is reasonable to assume that the negotiation failed, and thus this case should not apply to the penalty for non-payment of deposit. The defendant is not required to bear the responsibility for breaching the contract and returning double the deposit. After the first-instance ruling, the plaintiff appealed.Recently, the appellate court upheld the original judgment. [Legal Advice] In the trading process, it is necessary to exercise due diligence. As the buyer, it is necessary to exercise due diligence in the signing of the contract, such as verifying the information of the property owner, whether the property is occupied, and other relevant information, and clearly stating the specific time and place of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when performing the contract."

In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day. Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ” However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract. translation1: "According to a recent report from the Xinhua News Agency, the Jiangxi Province in China plans to train 10,000 rural elementary school music, art, and physical education teachers within the next three years to strengthen the teacher team and promote balanced development of rural compulsory education. Starting from 2016, the Jiangxi Province will allocate three years to train one music, art, and physical education teacher for each rural elementary school (village and below) in the province, with a total of 10,000 teachers to be trained. The training objectives are rural elementary school teachers aged 45 or below with music, art, and physical education knowledge or talents, who can also teach other subjects in addition to music, art, and physical education.Through training, they will acquire basic knowledge and teaching skills in the field of aesthetics, update their teaching concepts and ideas, master modern teaching methods, enhance their teaching ability, activity design ability, campus culture ability, and self-development ability, and build a team of multi-skilled music and aesthetics teachers. The relevant person in charge of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will deploy employment work for Beijing university graduates from the aspects of strengthening supply and demand matching, enhancing policy support, expanding employment channels, ensuring difficult assistance, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.Reporters have learned that the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau will establish a practice platform, increase job placements, and actively contact 40 universities' graduate employment experience bases, visiting units, and integrating demand and job information. translation1: "The State Council Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice to strengthen the epidemic prevention and control work in border cities. The notice requires that people who leave land border cities (excluding those with a border with Hong Kong and Macao) within 48 hours must have a negative nucleic acid test result, and after arriving in the land border city, they must undergo at least one nucleic acid test. The time range for the above requirements is from the date of determining the border city range and announcing it in each province, autonomous region, and municipality, to March 15, 2022.In addition, it is noted that under certain conditions, cities at the border can study the establishment of a buffer zone for epidemic prevention and control within their jurisdiction. The National Health Commission's Office of Disease Prevention and Control has introduced that for some border cities, cross-border trade is the main pillar of the local economy, and there is frequent exchange between the two sides of the border. Implementing differentiated management policies based on the division of regions can turn the first line of defense from one to two lines, which may achieve the goal of reducing the risk of the epidemic spreading across the border and minimizing the social impact and cost of epidemic prevention and control.Recently, there have been several domestic cluster-type epidemics in our country, all of which were imported from overseas epidemic areas through border cities. The above notice points out that this exposes some problems such as delayed and inadequate local epidemic monitoring and early warning, poor implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, formalism in regular nucleic acid testing, insufficient disinfection of cold chain items at various nodes, inadequate management of centralized isolation facilities, and insufficient scientific and accurate handling of epidemic emergencies. The notice requires that efforts should be made from nine aspects, including improving the mechanism of border city epidemic control, strengthening the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, etc., to fill in the gaps in the epidemic prevention and control work of border cities, and to do a good job of epidemic prevention and control work in a rigorous and scientifically accurate manner, to tighten the defense line against the import of epidemics.Notice emphasizes that each border city should synchronize the study and deployment of epidemic prevention and ensuring people's livelihood work, publish and publicize the hotline for people's livelihood guarantee, regularly check and resolve hidden dangers in the supply of basic necessities such as food and prices, and promptly respond to and proactively address prominent issues raised by the public. According to the notice, the border cities referred to include the counties (cities, districts, banners) where land, water, and air ports are located, as well as the prefecture-level cities, autonomous regions, and municipalities where they are located, and the directly-administered municipalities. The specific scope shall be determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality) based on epidemic prevention needs and announced in a timely manner."

reference: Negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours and setting up a "buffer zone", the State Council joint prevention and control mechanism issued a document to strengthen epidemic prevention and control in port cities - Xinhua News Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival. According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022. In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction. According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges. The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost. Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities. The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation. The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases. The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses. According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.

translation1: "A group of Asian-American organizations filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, alleging that three Ivy League universities, including Yale University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College, discriminated against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. The Asian American Education Foundation, which led the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the same day to announce the complaint.The chairman of this organization, Wan Yuchong, said at a press conference that over the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American top schools has doubled, but the proportion of Asians in these three schools has basically remained the same. Many studies have shown that these top schools discriminate against Asian applicants in their admission process through \"comprehensive consideration\". Wan Yuchong introduced that a study by Sanders et al. in 2014 showed that among these three schools, the relative number of applicants, Asians had the lowest admission rate compared to all other ethnic groups.According to data from the U.S. Department of Education, among Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have been implementing de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years. Zhao Yuchun told a reporter from Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit a complaint and request that the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department investigate and take action to prevent these schools from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in their admissions. They also hope that the schools that are being sued will take this issue seriously and change their admission policies towards Asian students.Currently, the three universities that have been sued have not yet responded. The Asian American Education Foundation was established in 2015 and previously sued Harvard University for discriminatory admissions, but the US Department of Education did not accept the case due to procedural reasons. This time, in addition to the Chinese American community, other groups such as the Indian American, Japanese American, Korean American, and Pakistani American education organizations have also participated in the lawsuit."

Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day. According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level. According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process. As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants. Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years. They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students. The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet. Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds. In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
